price: А међу нама има и добрих и оних који то нису, има нас врста различитих;
arabic: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلصَّٰلِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَۖ كُنَّا طَرَآئِقَ قِدَدٗا

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-annā minnā al-ṣāliḥūna waminnā dūna dhālika kunnā ṭarāiqa qidadan
